thread.title: Uber suspends controversial UberPOP service in France
thread.title_full: Uber suspends controversial UberPOP service in France

title: Uber suspends controversial UberPOP service in France
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Fri, Jul 3, 2015, 15:15 BST - UK Markets close in 1 hr 15 mins Uber suspends controversial UberPOP service in France AFP – 3 hours ago View Photo 

Uber said Friday it was suspending its controversial low-cost UberPOP service in France, six months after it was banned by the government and following a spate of strikes by taxi drivers. 
"Yes, it's true," said spokesman Gregoire Kopp. UberPOP was a service that put customers in touch with unlicenced private drivers, angering taxi drivers who have held nationwide strikes in recent weeks.
